```{r echo=TRUE}

#   https://www.kaggle.com/ronitf/heart-disease-uci/downloads/heart-disease-uci.zip/1
www = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/solujan/diplo-datos/master/AnalisisYCuracion/input/heart.csv"
data <- read.delim(www, sep=",",header = TRUE) 
#data <- data[-1]


print(data)

```

```{r echo=TRUE}
plot(data[, 4:10], col = data$sex, pch = 18, main = "Players")
```



```{r}
library(mclust)

# initialize 3 different classes.
initialk <- mclust::hc(data = data, modelName = "EII")
initialk <- mclust::hclass(initialk, 3)
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
# Select 4 continuous variables and look for three distinct groups.
mcl.model <- Mclust(data[, 3:14], 2)
# Plot our results.
plot(mcl.model, what = "classification", main = "Mclust Classification")
```
